data.text: The sons of Gomer were Ashkenaz, Diphath, and Togarmah.
The sons of Ham were Cush, Mizraim, Put, and Canaan.
Cush begot Nimrod; he began to be a mighty one on the earth.
Pathrusim, Casluhim (from whom came the Philistines and the Caphtorim).
Canaan begot Sidon, his firstborn, and Heth;
the Hivite, the Arkite, and the Sinite;
The sons of Shem were Elam, Asshur, Arphaxad, Lud, Aram, Uz, Hul, Gether, and Meshech.
To Eber were born two sons: the name of one was Peleg, for in his days the earth was divided; and his brotherâ€™s name was Joktan.

text: Ibu Chukwu onye dimma
(You're a good God)
Ibu Alpha and omega Mo
(You're my Alpha and omega)
Onye bu onye pka Zu Nma lite nogu Gu
(The one who has become the chief corner stone)
Ye Kan gi nasi ibu chimo
(That's why am giving you all my praise)

data.label: tag
text: Bawo lese to oluwa olorun
Olorun gbogbo aye eti tobi to
(How great you are,Creator of the universe,you are so great)

data.label: tag
text: gbogbo aye Ko gba yin Beni orun Ko gbayin
Oluwa eti Tobi to
(You fill the heavens and the earth,you are so great)

data.label: tag
text: Glory honour power to the one who reigns forever (Amen)
Blessings and the praise to the lamb of God forever(Amen)
Why wouldn't I shout your praise
Who wouldn't serve a Father like you o
Oyo yo Chim oma Chim oma Chima
(My Gracious good God)
Ndi mozi Bini gwe anasi hallelujah
(The angels in heaven sings hallelujah)
Anasi hallelujah
(They sing hallelujah)
Jehovah melu wo
(Jehovah has the victory)

data.label: tag
text: Ki Okan ati Ara mi Je ti Jesu lai
(My heart and my body is for Jesus)
And crown him
Lord of all
